mapper.select: SELECT IN_CODE AS inCode, MT_CODE AS mtCode, (SELECT MT_NAME FROM MT WHERE MT.MT_CODE = MT_IN.MT_CODE) AS mtName, CP_CODE AS cpCode, INQUANTITY AS inquantity, INPUT_DATE AS inputDate, ED AS ed, LOT_NO AS lotNo, COMM AS comm FROM MT_IN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MT_IN (IN_CODE, MT_CODE, CP_CODE, INQUANTITY, INPUT_DATE, ED, LOT_NO, COMM) VALUES (#{inCode}, #{mtCode}, #{cpCode}, #{inquantity}, #{inputDate}, #{ed}, #{lotNo}, #{comm})
